TopicTitle: Tried to build an Apollo styled lander system.

Articles.Content: Had to go into an orbit seven KM above the mun using a nuclear engine, realized I didn't have the required fuel, I tried to return using the return capsule but didn't have enough fuel, now Jeb and bobgun be needing rescue.
Heh, that happens . Hopefully you'll be able to get them! Share pictures!

Finally finished it, already three missions completed with it, one failed due to my stupidity to orbit in the wrong direction to get the Thor lander back to the Odin return module, had to send a rescue vehicle over to get them.

The other two were pretty good, both got all crew back in one peace.

I'll be sharing some pics soon, it's by far the largest rocket I've built.
